item.title: Introduction
item.description: Welcome to Code Review. What are the main learning outcomes? # When reviewing: Does the pull request address the issue? Are there any deal breakers that would stop you accepting the changes? Can you suggest any improvements? What is a good way to phrase your suggested improvements? Is the solution overly complicated? For an example of an overly complicated solution, see the famous fizz buzz in Tensorflow. Are the comments up to date, necessary, helpful?
